verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: has] released a series of photographs of himself at the G7 Summit in Canada last week showing he had a ' great relationship ' with the other world leaders .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] has [V: released] [ARG1: a series of photographs of himself at the G7 Summit in Canada last week showing he had a ' great relationship ' with the other world leaders] .
President Donald Trump has released a series of photographs of himself at the G7 Summit in Canada last week [V: showing] [ARG1: he had a ' great relationship ' with the other world leaders] .
President Donald Trump has released a series of photographs of himself at the G7 Summit in Canada last week showing [ARG0: he] [V: had] [ARG1: a ' great relationship ' with the other world leaders] .
